title: THE HAUNTING OF ASHGROVE ABBEY
subtitle: A Chilling Specter Stalks the Hallowed Halls—Is There a Mortal Hand at Work?
teaser: Monks at Ashgrove Abbey report ghostly apparitions and strange noises. When a priceless relic vanishes, fear gives way to suspicion. Is the abbey truly haunted, or is a clever thief at large?
briefing: For weeks, the monks of Ashgrove Abbey have been plagued by eerie happenings. Now, the revered Silver Chalice is missing. The abbot pleads for discretion—and a sharp mind to pierce the veil of superstition.

abbey_scene.descriptionTemplate: an ancient abbey shrouded in mist

cemetery_ground.descriptionTemplate: a mossy graveyard behind the abbey

library_study.descriptionTemplate: a quiet library filled with ancient tomes

characters.name: Abbot Francis
characters.description: A dignified man, troubled by recent events.
characters.initialDialogue: "The abbey has stood for centuries. Never have we known such unrest."

conditionalDialogue.clue_relic_missing: The chalice vanished after the ghost appeared.

characters.name: Brother Paul
characters.initialDialogue: "I saw the specter, I swear it! It glided among the graves."

conditionalDialogue.clue_footprints: There were footprints in the dew—too large for any of us.

characters.name: Madge the Innkeeper
characters.description: A shrewd woman with a sharp tongue.
characters.initialDialogue: "Ghosts? Bah! I say someone’s after the abbey’s silver."

clues.title: Missing Relic
clues.discoveryText: The Silver Chalice is gone, its display case forced open.
clues.notebookSummary: The abbey’s prized relic was stolen during the haunting.

clues.title: Strange Footprints
clues.discoveryText: Large muddy footprints lead from the abbey to the graveyard wall.
clues.notebookSummary: Unusual footprints suggest a human culprit.

clues.title: Ghost Story
clues.discoveryText: A local claims the abbey is cursed, but offers no proof.
clues.notebookSummary: Tavern gossip blames a curse for the haunting.

clues.title: Old Abbey Map
clues.discoveryText: A map reveals a hidden passage from the abbey to the graveyard.
clues.notebookSummary: There is a secret passage connecting the abbey and cemetery.

solution.motive: Brother Paul, desperate to pay old debts, staged the haunting to cover his theft of the chalice.
solution.method: He donned a sheet to play the ghost, then used the secret passage to escape with the relic.
